profiles:
Summary Frank Johnson is Vice President Intel Americas and the Director of Intel’s Americas Enterprise Solution Sales (ESS) organization. ESS’s charter is to work with Information Technology leaders in Global 2000 Corporations and Public Sector accounts to advise, collaborate and sell Intel-based solutions to critical busness problems & opportunities. ESS is also focused on working with eco-system partners to help create demand and accelerate technology adoption based on new usage models within the America’s business segment.

Summary As a key facilitator of strategic initiatives, I am responsible for driving new business opportunities to help create new revenue generating businesses, products and services. Working with teams within Intel and its customers, I help drive, explore, research and bring together those new opportunities. I enjoy the challenge of creativity and exploring new ways of doing business and creating teams to tackle the next business challenge. I handle relationships with key customers in Japan and Europe. Bilingual in English and Arabic. Detail Oriented Experience Sales Operations Program Manager TiVo June 2014  – Present (1 year 3 months) San Jose, CA A leader in the advanced television entertainment market. 
•Manage operational aspects for key customer accounts including: inventory, order management, pricing & project management. 
•Host meetings & produce meeting minutes. 
•Process & manage PO’s & RMA’s. 
• Process & manage corporate support orders & internal service activation requests. 
•Manage and resolve customer support escalations regarding sales and returns, including billing & account changes. 
•Collaborate with fulfillment house regularly. 
•Set up promotions in the back-end system, working cross-functionally with IT, marketing, customer support & the web team. 
•Document processes & procedures as they are created or revised.  
•Provide reporting, analytics, KPI dashboards & presentations. Sr. Order Management Administrator (Team Lead) EMC November 2012  –  March 2014  (1 year 5 months) Santa Clara, CA EMC is a global leader in enabling businesses & service providers to transform their operations & deliver information technology as a service (ITaaS). Fundamental to this transformation is cloud computing. Through innovative products & services, EMC accelerates the journey to cloud computing, helping IT departments to store, manage, protect & analyze their most valuable asset — information — in a more agile, trusted & cost-efficient way.
